source_objects.title: Business Strategy
source_objects.description: Become a master strategist with courses on the following: business strategy, performance innovation, marketing strategy, customer loyalty and more.

items.title: Intro to Design Thinking: Innovation Strategy for Business

visible_instructors.title: Jeannie Chan
visible_instructors.job_title: Strategist & Marketer for businesses large and small

items.headline: Innovation toolkit based on design thinking principals and real-world cases to bring out the creative genius in you!
objectives_summary: Understand the design thinking process and how to apply it for businesses
Learn how to think like a designer and design new experiences or products for your consumers
See how you may be able to tackle a business problem differently and find new business opportunities

items.title: Online Business V2: Sales Scripts for Every Sales Funnel
items.headline: Learn millionaire mindset scripts that convert visitors into hyper-buyers, selling books to coaching worth 25K+!
objectives_summary: Build a complete sales funnel and start sending traffic to get your first sales by building effective business communication.
Build a highly interactive list of repeat hyper-buyers through proper business communication skills.
Discover how to double or even triple your business overnight in this business communication course.

items.title: Make your Online Business Opportunities Skyrocket
items.headline: Discover online business strategies that require little work and great results
objectives_summary: Over time you will be less and less dependent of your work and start receiving money from several sources

items.title: Crisis Leadership - Winston Churchill
items.headline: Use Symbolic Modelling to better understand how you can perform at peak and inspire others during a crisis
objectives_summary: Embrace the truism that the people you lead in a crisis are less interested in what you say and more concerned with how you make them feel
Develop your own metaphor as a shorthand for your personal leadership style
Recognise your own personal leadership style at the emotional level
